name: Pet Impact
description:
[Game introduction]
Legend starts right now! Get ready for the impact from the most exciting adventure! Classic RPG adventure in this magic world!
With extraordinary skill animation and various of pets, gives you the best 2D RPG mobile experience!

[Evolution to the best]
Hundreds of pets with more than three form to evolve.
Each evolution brings brand new skill effects.

[PvP all day long]
Real-time PvP each weekend, with multiple global PvP features.
Let you battle with other pet trainers all day long!

[Over 200 pets available]
Over 200 pets with different form waiting for you to discover.
Find your unique Line-up and defeat all your enemies!
